I'm usually given the choice of toddler-like frills and cartoon decorations,  or far too "late teen/ early adult" looking dresses  My granddaughters loved these dresses! I purchased this for my granddaughter's fall dance. I was told the week of her dance that she needed something to wear. I immediately found this on Amazon and purchased it to arrive the day before her dance. Thank you Amazon!  The dress looks exactly as described and as the photos depict. She loved it! It looked so elegant with the delicate sleeves, but the dress was very comfortable and durable for a night of dancing and elementary school fun! The fit was true to size and she looked beautiful wearing it. She was so pleased and I got all the bonus points for coming through in the clutch!
